text: Steven Leslie Hallard is an archer from Great Britain. He was born on 22 February 1965. Hallard competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics, 1988 Summer Olympics, 1992 Summer Olympics, and the 1996 Summer Olympics.Steven HallardSteven HALLARD == References == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:British archers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Great Britain
title: Steven Hallard
